name: Conflict Author
desc: When the total HP lost by ally targets is equal to 100% of their Max HP or after recovering from being downed, deals "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 350% of their Max HP to all enemies. When a character's turn starts, consumes HP equal to 5% of Max HP, increasing this value by 5% after every time this effect is triggered. When ally characters become downed for the first time in this battle, restore their current HP to 100% of their Max HP, and HP will no longer be consumed when their turn starts.
